label: Missing Tags
sql: SELECT * FROM links WHERE tags IS NULL;

label: Empty Tags
sql: SELECT count(*) counter FROM links WHERE tags = '';

label: Missing Status
sql: SELECT count(*) counter FROM links WHERE status IS NULL;

label: Empty Status
sql: SELECT count(*) counter FROM links WHERE status = '';

label: Missing Dates
sql: SELECT count(*) counter FROM links WHERE updated_at IS NULL;

label: Empty Dates
sql: SELECT count(*) counter FROM links WHERE updated_at = '';

label: Wrong Dates
sql: SELECT count(*) counter FROM links WHERE updated_at < '2000-01-01';
